name: AppClipHeaderImage
desc: The data structure that represents the image that appears on the App Clip card of a default App Clip experience.

items.name: attributes
items.desc: The attributes that describe the App Clip Header Images resource.

items.name: id
items.desc: The opaque resource ID that uniquely identifies an App Clip Header Images resource.

items.name: links
items.desc: Navigational links that include the self-link.

items.name: relationships
items.desc: The navigational links to related data and included resource types and IDs.
